message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm open to negotiating in the future.
Your offer was quite greedy, Alice. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Time is money, and we're both losing it!
Okay, let's compromise. I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need to get at least 5500 to make this worth it for me.  We're both losing money with every round, so let's be practical.
This is my final offer, Alice. 5800 for me and 4200 for you. The inflation is eating away at our potential gains.  We need to decide now!
